<a href="https://1boon.daum.net/docs/5e4dfed67391205c8a530566" class="link_item ?c_id=ssmco-5e4dfed67391205c8a530566&c_source=1boon&c_ch=">

<span class="origin_item">지식을 말하다</span>
</div>
</a>
</div>
<div class="box_channel ">
<a href="https://1boon.daum.net/docs/5e4e276789f104270d58a329" data-media="IMAGE" class="link_item ?c_id=ssmco-5e4e276789f104270d58a329&c_source=1boon&c_ch=">
<span class="thumb_g">
<img src="//t1.daumcdn.net/daumtop_deco/images/op/default.png" data-src=" //img2.daumcdn.net/thumb/S308x188/?fname=https://t1.daumcdn.net/liveboard/glowpick/6a588cc2ee3e4b0ab2a51a31163d635e.png" width="154" height="94" class="img_thumb" alt="">

<div class="service_layer">
<h2 class="screen_out">전체 서비스</h2>
<div class="layer_body #more">
<div class="coll_svc fst">
<dl class="sort_service ">
<dt>커뮤니케이션</dt>
<dd><a href="https://mail.daum.net" class="link_svc #mail" >메일</a></dd>

<div class="box_story box_newslive">
<h3 class="tit_subject">뉴스 생중계</h3>
<ul class="list_newslive">
<li>
<a href="https://media.daum.net/tv/1265794/live?p2m=true" class="link_station #live">
<span class="item_station">
<img src="https://t1.daumcdn.net/daumtop_deco/images/mtop/2017/m640/station_kbs_v3.png" height="14" class="img_station" alt="KBS">
<span class="ico_pctop2 ico_live2">생중계</span>
<strong class="tit_item">사사건건</strong>

</div>

<dd><a href="http://map.kakao.com/index.jsp?REGION=01&amp;STARTNAME=&amp;ENDNAME=&amp;OPTION=1&amp;URLLINK=true&amp;target=subway" class="link_svc #subway" >지하철노선도</a></dd>
</dl>
<dl class="sort_service ">
<dt class="ico_vert tit_split">
<a href="https://www.kakaocorp.com/" class="link_titsvc #kakaocorp">카카오 소식</a>

</dl>
</div>

<h2 id="blogTitle" class="screen_out">블로그 정보</h2>
<div id="blogTab" data-tab="tistory" class="panel_bloc tistory_on">
<h3 id="cafeTab" class="tit_tabcont tit_cafe"><a href="http://top.cafe.daum.net/" class="txt_pctop link_tit"><span class="ir_wa">카페</span></a></h3>
